title: CRITICAL REALISM IN ACTION SEMINAR SERIES
abstractText: This series set out to show how critical realism (CR) can be applied in social science research. In each seminar, participants discussed different research methods, how they used CR, and how it made a difference to their project. Several publications emerged. A book based on the series and co-edited by the organizers of the series, with seventeen chapters on a range of methods and the contribution of CR, will be published by Oxford University Press in 2013.
